src:
9to5Mac Daily: November 07, 2019 – Apple details iPhone privacy in iOS 13
07 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Chance Miller
Listen to a recap of the top stories of the day from 9to5Mac. 9to5Mac Daily is available on iTunes and Apple’s Podcasts app, Stitcher, TuneIn, Google Play, or through our dedicated RSS feed for Overcast and other podcast players.

Sponsored by Infinity Cable: Get the new Infinity Cable with interchangeable magnetic tips for USB-C, micro-USB and Lightning- the first with 100W Power Delivery. Available up to 55% off with early bird pricing now.




New episodes of 9to5Mac Daily are recorded every weekday. Subscribe to our podcast in iTunes/Apple Podcast or your favorite podcast player to guarantee new episodes are delivered as soon as they’re available.

Stories discussed in this episode:  



Apple expands employee benefits for new parents and mental health, more


Health Records integration now available for US veterans in the Apple Health app


How secure is the iPhone in iOS 13? Apple explains privacy


LifeProof debuts iPhone 11 waterproof cases w/ slimmer design


Stacktrace Podcast 061: “The Apple Cinematic Universe”
